name: LaBella Flora Children's Boutique
overview:
LaBella Flora Children’s Boutique is an exquisite children’s boutique designed JUST FOR GIRLS. They hand select each and every piece of clothing for our store. There desire is to bring the most beautiful clothing, FOR GIRLS, direct to your door.

The owners of LaBella Flora Children’s Boutique have been touched by adoption. They have been blessed with three beautiful children. LaBella Flora is a children’s boutique that would also like to provide a source for adoption information. Their goal is to provide links to various adoption related sites.
